title: Legacy client broken?
body: Unable to even launch the legacy client for league was curious if it was just broken or not

replies.body: Mines broken too. And I only have the legacy client. No alpha. So can't play I guess.
What does broken mean?  :/  What are you seeing?  What's happening?  Are there any error messages?

my client is doing this too. it will play the alpha/beta client, but it will not launch the legacy. after opening up the client, it shows me my log in name, and password. when i go down to the bottom of the screen to click the launch legacy client, the window closes, and all LoL related apps and programs end, leaving me with just my desktop. i do not mind the alpha/beta, other than the lack of being able to see the player history, to see if i had been paired up with the same people, and the fact that i do not get to play the weekend modes.

I had both the old lol and alpha pinned to my task bar and the old one randomly disappeared.

Now I'm unable to open the old client upon selecting legacy client at the alpha log in screen.

Edit:  So apparently, now that the old pinned lol client is gone from my task bar, I have to manually admin open the alpha client via right click to get the legacy client to work.
Broken as in when I try to open the launcher nothing opens. I normally run it as admin, but no matter what I try the launcher wont open. :( PBE opens fine.

Thanks for the information.  If you recently patched or updated to the test client it's possible that the game files corrupted during installation.  The PBE uses it's own files so it can load fine.  The other factor here could be security settings that's preventing your game files from being scanned.  Running as admin is one small step, but I recommend going over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide instead.  

It would be better to check your permissions first before considering a complete reinstall.  Let me know if that does the trick, and we'll go from there.

Now that I think about it, I noticed my firewall was off so I turned it back on. Maybe that's preventing it from working? I'll see if its my security settings, and if not I'll try reinstalling. Thanks for the help!
No problem.  If you want, check out our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  It will help to automatically configure firewall settings for league!
I still can't get it to open after reinstalling...firewall, antivirus both disabled still nothing.

Thanks for trying all of these steps.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team will dig into this with you.  There are a list of logs that can also help give context.  Since you are unable to access the HRT, you may need to obtain it manually and attach it to the ticket.  

[DxDiag](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq5)
[Your latest R3d Log (check the date!)](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq7)
[Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

We'll reply back as soon as we can!

Thanks, but I was able to sign in after finding the LCU installer leftover in my downloads and patching. Then with the log in issue it was solved by following the log in problem resolution someone posted earlier on the boards. I hope you guys find a solution with the legacy client. LCU is so laggy;
Oh I have that but that won't open either. Must be my settings.. Nevermind just fixed it by using repair.
I mean it could be broken, but I don't really have enough information to know.  Let me know what exactly is happening or what you're seeing, and I'll try to help.  Let me know.
eh i just click legacy and it just wont open or anything yet the updated one can open but the reason why i dont use it is because its really laggy

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=rEGWVcaJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-23T19:39:55.329+0000)
>
> I mean it could be broken, but I don't really have enough information to know.  Let me know what exactly is happening or what you're seeing, and I'll try to help.  Let me know.

Something similar might be happening to me . At first I was having trouble with with the patch, now after I click the launch button nothing opens up, it closes itself and doesn't launch the login screen. I've tried opening it from other sources ( like the launcher admin or whatever ) nothin works .
